TextLibrary.Text: That was a good fight. Only two rounds to go.
That was a good fight. Only two rounds to go.
Tell me about my next opponent.
Tell me about my next opponent.
He is known as "Shotgun Jimmy". He likes to fly small ships and dance circles around his foes.
He is known as "Shotgun Jimmy". He likes to fly small ships and dance circles around his foes.
I know how to deal with small ships. I'll go to the third round now.
I can handle small ships. I'll go to the third round now.
